The #Lions have placed Haloti Ngata on active/non-football injury list. More details from Tim Twentyman: http://www.detroitlions.com/news/lions-insider/article-1/TWENTYMAN-Lions-place-DT-Haloti-Ngata-on-NFI-list/5372c92f-1820-4791-8248-c98a92406915

It amazes me how many individuals only like this team when they're good. Ill say it again we went 11-5 with a brand new staff and a list of injured players. If you're a fan act like it, if not go root for another team. This is nothing serious he doesn't need surgery and will be back practicing in no time. #defendtheden
Oh great here we go!
so the lions traded for an unhealthy player? hmm...
Whoever thought this guy would be Suh's replacement has zero football knowledge. Ngata isn't 1/4th the DT Suh is.

Everyone stop worrying, he is an elder veteran and will take time off now and then during training camp. He will be the disruptive force in the middle of our defense that we hope him to be. Relax, thank you.
It's the same thing every year. Oh well still a lions fan.

I am not worried about our defense! We have a great LB core and Tulloch returns!  We have a good secondary! Hope Diggs pans out for the nickel! Ansah should be getting better, maybe Taylor, or Ried will step up on the line! Can't wait to show the haters! #detroitvseverybody
Relax people he is a seasoned veteran that will take some time off during the camp . Its a non football injury . He will be fine
And it begins
Hope he comes back soon, but what is wrong with him?
Come On Twentyman dude! Don't tease us! LOL!  Jump in this thread and tell us not to worry!
This article basically said exactly what the headline did, only with more words and some statistics.  What it failed to do was actually explain what the headline means.
My fellow lions,do not jump the gun,it's non nfl,could be a hangnail,name it aaron.

For those of you expecting Nata to replace Suh, forget about it.

Suh was the team‚Äôs best player, face, and lightning rod.  Not since Isiah Thomas has a Detroit player wore the white and black hat simultaneously ‚Äì filling the role as hero and villain for Lions‚Äô fans and haters alike.

With him gone, the light will shine squarely on who is supposed to be the franchise of the team.  The player who has a pile of stats but is out of the NFL‚Äôs top 100.  Never before have we seen a player defended so vigorously by his fans just to see him continue to underwhelm his peers and NFL experts.  The time is now for Stafford.  It is time for him to be a proven commodity compared to the possession-to-possession wild card he has been for 6 seasons.

Would you prefer him to be out there now or when the regular season starts?
Duh.....
Here we go......
When the hell are they gonna show us on training camp?
So what's the injury?
I don't think they wanna take any chances with they guys, so they taking it day by day with this guy
Relax people. It's the first day.

He has not played in this style def his missed camp time and possible preseason experience is gonna derail the whole yr.  Shoulda got rid of whatever dead weight we had and signed Suh .... his presence affected so many around him .....ziggy will feel his loss as well as the lbs.... they will attack us totally different now ...
Pick up the DT just released from Seattle!
Big dummy he's hurt already A non-football injury William Clay Ford Curse continues
Always remember to stretch!
Very happy to be starting our 3rd Lions Training Camp! Come on out and Defend the Den with a Mean Weenie or two!!
What do you expect from the Lions this season?
To win that's what I expect from Caldwell!!!!
Not getting my hopes up.  It will be another season of Lions football.  Penalties, injuries, and turnovers.
6-10 No hope for the Lions, until they prove us wrong.....
Win a SuperBowl and shock the world
The same ol same ol.  A lot of hype in preseason, followed by a loosing season.  As long as there is a blue oval in the front office, the lions go no where
I expect another losing season with lots of disappointment and excuses.
my hopes are up up up   !!!!!!!!!!!!  love the coach..go Lions
Same as every other season,  nothing!!

We will find out this year if Jim Caldwell is the real deal or not! The Lions went 11-5 last year and should have won two or three more! They have to at least match 11-5 for me to bye in, even though their schedule is tougher this year! Because they should have won more games last year that is why 11-5 is okay with me this year!!
Unfortunately, I do not think they will win 11 games this year!
We did great last season. Just as long as we fix our offensive line and get Stafford some protection we will be even better.
Best wishes for a great season.  As long as the beer is cold I'll watch !
Nothing same old story winning ego kicks in then loss after loss . I dont even listen any more about the lions
Injuries will be the key ...I don't expect Stafford to be running the show for long ....Ya have to protect the QB guys
Win or lose I'll still be watching. Love Lion Sundays!!

No playoffs. You guys only made it in 2014 and 2011 because of easy schedules. And when it's the 2nd half of the year, Stafford can't lead comebacks the way the 2 best ever in Brady and Roethlisberger can.
I don't expect, I know!   Lions 12-4 this year with at least 1 playoff win!
Nothing
not much
Same as the prior 58 years, nuttin honey.
Nothing
They'll look great first 5 or 6 games then disintegrate.
I love how everyone is talking like they didn't just win 11 games last year...
